marklogic.body:
Â Exactly!Â Wounds to the face and scalp tend to Bleed heavily because of the concentration of blood vessels close to the surface of the skin.Â Zimmerman looks pretty good for someone who was in a fight for his life.
Let's not forget that Zimmerman has a history of violence.....domestic violence, resisting arrest and Battery of a police officer.Â His ex-fiance was so fearful of him that she has a restraining order against him.Â
As far as Trayvon being expelled from school......Zimmerman has been expelled from Seminole State College......as if is relevant.
